attributes.action: Stop price increases on food and medicines during the outbreak of Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: So that the government can consider taking direct action to regulate prices.
attributes.background: The government body should be responsible for monitoring business competition and preventing anti-competitive activities, the Competition and Markets Authority, needs to prevent retailers against taking advange of the coronavirus outbreak.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the CMA has made a statement about sales and pricing practices during the Coronavirus outbreak, you can read this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/covid-19-sales-and-pricing-practices-during-coronavirus-outbreak

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
